properties.description: Everyone welcome. We close between 13:00-14:00 for lunch Monday to Friday, open until 16:00 on Saturday, no lunch closure. You will need a Smartcard (library card) in order to use our public computers. It is free to join the library.
properties.title: Blackwood Library

properties.description: All ages welcome We have play equipment suitable for babies and toddlers
